html:
• Eikon search string for individual stock moves: STXBZ
  • The Day Ahead newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2ggOmBi
  • The Morning News Call newsletter: http://tmsnrt.rs/2fwPLTh

U.S. stock index futures rose on Tuesday as investors picked up beaten-down stocks ahead of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's testimony that may offer fresh insight on policy tightening and the central bank's plans to tackle inflation. .N

At 7:32 ET, Dow e-minis 1YMc1 were up 0.17% at 36,013. S&P 500 e-minis ESc1 were up 0.32% at 4,677.25, while Nasdaq 100 e-minis NQc1 were up 0.52% at 15,688.75.

The top three NYSE percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.N:
** OneSmart International Education Group Ltd <ONE.N>, up 34.0%
** IMAX Corporation <IMAX.N>, up 9.7%
** Build-A-Bear Workshop Inc. BBW.N, up 8.1%

The top three NYSE percentage losers premarket .PRPL.N:
** Avista Corporation <AVA.N>, down 9.4%
** TechnipFMC Plc <FTI.N>, down 6.9%
** UserTesting Inc <USER.N>, down 6.1%

The top two Nasdaq percentage gainers premarket .PRPG.O:
** Black Diamond Therapeutics Inc <BDTX.O>, up 23.8%
** TSR Inc <TSRI.O>, up 20.8%

The top three Nasdaq percentage losers premarket .PRPL.O:
** Zivo Bioscience Inc <ZIVO.O>, down 19.6%
** Immunome Inc <IMNM.O>, down 13.7%
** Huadi International Group Co Ltd HUDI.O, down 8.6%


** NETSTREIT Corp NTST.N: down 2.6% premarket
BUZZ-Netstreit slips after pricing $200 mln equity offering (Full Story)



** Intel Corporation INTC.O: up 1.6% premarket
BUZZ-Rises after naming Micron finance chief Zinsner as CFO (Full Story)



** Immunome Inc IMNM.O: down 13.7% premarket
BUZZ-Slumps on FDA's clinical hold letter for COVID-19 antibody (Full Story)



** Rivian Automotive Inc RIVN.O: down 3.4% premarket
BUZZ-Rivian slides after posting 2021 output, COO retires (Full Story)



** Big Lots Inc BIG.N: down 5.0% premarket
BUZZ-Shares slip on tepid profit forecast (Full Story)



** Abercrombie & Fitch Co ANF.N: up 6.0% premarket
BUZZ-Abercrombie & Fitch rises as post-holiday sales pick up (Full Story)



** Tesla Inc TSLA.O: up 1.1% premarket
BUZZ-Up after record monthly sales of China-made vehicles (Full Story)



** Nokia Oyj NOK.N: up 1.0% premarket
BUZZ-Nokia rises as outlook eases concerns over chip shortage hit (Full Story)



** Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O: up 0.5% premarket
BUZZ-MS raises Amazon PT on easing supply issues, calls for more disclosure on costs (Full Story)



** International Business Machines Corporation IBM.N: down 2.3% premarket
BUZZ-IBM slips on report of UBS downgrading rating to 'sell' (Full Story)



** TSR Inc TSRI.O: up 20.8% premarket
BUZZ-TSR jumps above two-month high on strong Q2 revenue (Full Story)



** Meta Platforms Inc FB.O: up 0.5% premarket
BUZZ-Meta Platforms mandates COVID-19 booster jabs for employees (Full Story)



** Velodyne Lidar Inc VLDR.O: up 3.4% premarket
BUZZ-Velodyne rises on sales agreement with QinetiQ (Full Story)





(Compiled by Oishee Majumdar in Bengaluru)
